title: There is absolutely no way a pick comp can work in solo q
body:
Teamfight comp or bust.

A bunch of random people of varying skill levels thrown together simply don't have the coordination or teamwork necessary to successfully play a pick comp. Hell, 90% of solo q people don't even realize how to build a team comp of any kind. This is why solo q is the toxic cesspool it is: people wonder why they get fed but can't carry, it's because their team is a mess of champions who don't work together at all.
